Articles.Content: Is there a keybinding for opening the cockpit window so you can see outside of your aircraft in the first person point of view?

Are you seeing what appears to be a blast shield? If yes, your fallback shaders are on, this is bad.

Are you using the Mk2 or Mk3 cockpits? They aren't finished yet

yeah, when I go into first person, the view is just the cockpit of the ship and not the outside...

Not sure if it's just an unfinished bit or if it's a bug or just my computer or what...
I have been wondering this also... I saw on youtube that you can see out the cockpit... but when I play the game inside the cockpit is just metal... and can't see outside...
Certain command pods just use a placeholder IVA with controls but no windows right now.
